description: A witness in the German trial returns to Halle, a year after the deadly attack at a synagogue.
title: Halle synagogue attack: Survivors relive terror in German trial
title_page: Halle synagogue attack: Survivors relive terror in German trial - BBC News
maintext: When she was called to take the stand, Mollie told me that being able to testify was a way of representing more than 100 family members murdered by the Nazis during World War Two. She felt she was speaking not only on her behalf but theirs too.
